summary: A standalone wood elf, archer class follower.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][center][color=#93c47d][size=5]Lyari– A standalone Follower[/size][/color][/center][/u][/b]
[center]Lyari is a Wood Elf follower. She’s an archer but she can handle a one-handed sword too. You can find her in Falkreath at the Dead Man’s Drink.
Lyari is marriable. She uses a UNP body.
 [/center]
[u][center][u][color=#93c47d][size=5][b]Credits[/b][/size][/color][/u][/center][/u][center][u][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/]DimonizedUNP Female Body by: dimon99[/url]
